channel.title: How do i set a timer for? [PI]
channel.description:
How do i set a timer for when people can trade when they first log in. I want it too be a 30 minute timer for where people can't pk/trade. If you can link me too a tut in my PM i'd be greatful! All help is appreciated.
Inb4 people say search on google other forums..
I have, I can't find anything...

item.title: How do i set a timer for? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

  1. Make a new delay
  2. Go to trade method change code to if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.tradedelay >= 1800000) at start
    And at the end
    } else {
    sm (“you are to new to trade”)
    }
    And that’s it pretty easy

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set a timer for? [PI]
